awards.title: the ISCA 2024 Distinguished Artifact Award
awards.summary: The award recognizes the artifact that (1) has the highest degree of reproducibility as well as ease of use and documentation, (2) allows other researchers to easily build upon the artifact's functionality for their own research, and (3) substantially supports the claims of the paper.
